hero.title: Create Next-Generation Content with AI
hero.subtitle: A unified platform to access ChatGPT, DALL-E, Gemini, and other leading neural networks. Accelerate your work and creativity.

models.title: One Interface for All Tasks
models.subtitle: We've combined the best neural networks so you can solve any task in one window.
models.chatgpt_desc: Perfect for writing texts, articles, letters, and creative content. Your universal text assistant.
models.dalle_desc: Create unique images, illustrations, and art objects from a text description.
models.gemini_desc: A powerful multimodal model from Google for complex analytical tasks and idea generation.
models.deepseek_desc: Your indispensable assistant for writing, debugging, and refactoring code in any programming language.

testimonials.title: What Our Users Say
testimonials.subtitle: Specialists from various fields trust us.
testimonials.student_text: I'm preparing for exams, and this tool is a lifesaver. Gemini helps structure information for essays, and ChatGPT quickly writes papers on given topics. Saved a ton of time and got the highest grade!
testimonials.entrepreneur_text: I run a small online store. With DALL-E, I generate unique images for product cards, and ChatGPT writes selling descriptions for them. Conversion has increased, and content manager costs have been reduced.
testimonials.developer_text: I use DeepSeek Coder for refactoring old code and writing unit tests. It offers elegant solutions and finds bugs I might have missed. The best coding assistant I've tried.

auth.forgotSubtitle: Enter your email, and we will send you a link to recover (check the backend console).
